Nightlight::

Nightlight brushed but she smiled "And you're kind, brave and nice" 
said Nightlight



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: No matter, I know enough about you now.
> 
> He leans in closer, and takes her hand.
> 
> Rodimus Prime(Whisper): You are beautiful, smart, and funny.
> 
> Rodimus plants a light kiss on her cheek.
